title: How much YouTube should a 7 year old watch? - Quora

response.answer_text: None at all as much of what is on there is rubbish. However, if you have age restricted to his age then that’s ok. Then the same is for all screen time, no more than a total of one hour daily and not within one hour of bed time.

How much time does the child’s parent or caregiver have to supervise? They shouldn’t be watching unsupervised and personally I’d limit it to a couple of videos per session, but ymmv and it depends what they are watching.
